content:
- 2 -
(4) The other crane referred to is of R-2 condition. For heavy construction equipment, R-2 condition has usually been con- sidered as acceptable because excess equipment of better condition for such category are not frequently obtainable. In this instance, we agree to delete the R-2 condition shovel crane and the 30 ft. boom following this crane.
(5) Excess equipment received normally will need repairs of various degree and all necessary repairs have always been taken care of by the recipient agencies. There is no obligation on part of CUSA and Mission to effect or finance such repairs.
(6) We agree to delete the wire rope and pump and motor mentioned in your memo MC-3860.
Your original files are returned herewith.
Encl. CC: 2D
51. 3. 100×200
國史馆 Academia Historien
312

paragraphs.content: (4) The other crane referred to is of R-2 condition. For heavy construction equipment, R-2 condition has usually been con- sidered as acceptable because excess equipment of better condition for such category are not frequently obtainable. In this instance, we agree to delete the R-2 condition shovel crane and the 30 ft. boom following this crane.

(5) Excess equipment received normally will need repairs of various degree and all necessary repairs have always been taken care of by the recipient agencies. There is no obligation on part of CUSA and Mission to effect or finance such repairs.
(6) We agree to delete the wire rope and pump and motor mentioned in your memo MC-3860.
Your original files are returned herewith.
